cartMenu.itemDescription: Grilled beef, soft corn tortillas, and fresh toppings – our Carne Asada Street Tacos are a taste of Mexico in every bite. Order now for a quick, flavorful feast!
Juicy grilled chicken, nestled in warm corn tortillas, topped with onions, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime. A delicious twist on traditional street tacos.
Sliced pork marinated in adobo, char-grilled to perfection. Served on soft corn tortillas with pineapple, onions, and cilantro. A tantalizing fusion of flavors.
Slow-cooked, tender pork, piled high on corn tortillas. Topped with diced onions, fresh cilantro, and a hint of lime. A classic favorite!
Spicy Mexican sausage, cradled in warm corn tortillas. Garnished with onions, cilantro, and a zesty kick. A bold and flavorful choice.
Melted cheese sandwiched between two flour tortillas, with your choice of meat. Served with salsa and guacamole on the side.
Crunchy tortilla chips loaded with melted cheese, beans, your choice of meat, guacamole, sour cream, and pico de gallo. The ultimate nacho experience.
Grilled corn on the cob smothered in a savory blend of mayonnaise, cotija cheese, chili powder, and lime. A street food favorite.
Sweet and creamy rice milk infused with cinnamon. The perfect refreshing drink to complement your taco feast.
Fruit-infused water with a touch of sweetness. Choose from flavors like watermelon, pineapple, or cucumber for a refreshing sip.
Mexican soda in assorted fruity flavors – a perfect fizzy companion to your taco experience.
Rich and indulgent hot chocolate with a hint of cinnamon. A comforting beverage choice.
Tender, slow-cooked shredded beef, wrapped in corn tortillas. Served with a side of consommé for dipping. A flavorful and comforting choice.
Beef tongue, cooked to perfection and nestled in warm corn tortillas. Topped with onions, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime. A savory delicacy.
Grilled veggies, black beans, and cheese tucked into soft corn tortillas. A delicious meat-free option bursting with flavor.
Crispy, beer-battered fish fillets in warm corn tortillas. Topped with cabbage slaw, chipotle mayo, and a squeeze of lime. A seafood delight.
Creamy, homemade guacamole served with a side of crispy tortilla chips. The perfect starter or snack.
Thick corn tortillas topped with beans, your choice of meat, lettuce, cheese, and salsa. A satisfying and savory dish.
Crispy corn tortillas layered with beans, your choice of meat, lettuce, cheese, and salsa. A crunchy and flavorful delight.
Robust coffee brewed with a touch of cinnamon. A warm and aromatic way to complete your meal.
